Sentencas: Hermetic sealing is a key requirement for the operation of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks in a system environment.
Titulo: Investigation of solid oxide fuel cell sealing behavior under stack relevant conditions at Forschungszentrum Julich

Sentencas: The sealant material has to withstand stresses due to mechanical loading, mismatch in thermal expansion coefficient and thermal gradients that arise during operation.
Titulo: Investigation of solid oxide fuel cell sealing behavior under stack relevant conditions at Forschungszentrum Julich

Sentencas: Based on leakage tests performed at Forschungszentrum Julich it was obvious that stacks, having been operated successfully in a furnace, are not necessarily usable in a system, e.g. because of deviating pressure differences and temperature gradients.
Titulo: Investigation of solid oxide fuel cell sealing behavior under stack relevant conditions at Forschungszentrum Julich

Sentencas: Thorough investigations including stack and stack dummy tests, and finite element modeling (FEM) were performed to get a comprehensive understanding of the various parameters, influencing the leak tightness of the sealing material.
Titulo: Investigation of solid oxide fuel cell sealing behavior under stack relevant conditions at Forschungszentrum Julich

Sentencas: It was found that even small temperature differences especially in the area of gas and air manifolds can create excessively high tensile stresses.
Titulo: Investigation of solid oxide fuel cell sealing behavior under stack relevant conditions at Forschungszentrum Julich

Sentencas: Based on initial FEM analyses, a better understanding of the problem has been obtained and a tool was developed that can assist in the design of more robust stacks.
Titulo: Investigation of solid oxide fuel cell sealing behavior under stack relevant conditions at Forschungszentrum Julich

Sentencas: These investigations and modeling activities will be continued with a main focus on thermal cycling, which is the next step in the list of requirements.
Titulo: Investigation of solid oxide fuel cell sealing behavior under stack relevant conditions at Forschungszentrum Julich
Investigation of solid oxide fuel cell sealing behavior under stack relevant conditions at Forschungszentrum Julich
